name: init_cell
body: let c = & mut ctx . accounts . cell ;
c . owner = ctx . accounts . admin . key () ;
c . bump_store = * ctx . bumps . get ("cell") . unwrap () ;

name: drain_cell
body: let (correct , _good_bump) = Pubkey :: find_program_address (& [b"cell" , c . owner . as_ref () , & c . tag . to_le_bytes ()] , ctx . program_id ,) ;
let seeds = & [b"cell" . as_ref () , c . owner . as_ref () , & c . tag . to_le_bytes () , core :: slice :: from_ref (& user_bump) ,] ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& correct , & ctx . accounts . sweeper . key () , lamports) ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . cell_hint . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . sweeper . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: cell
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = admin , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 1 , seeds = [b"cell" , admin . key () . as_ref () , tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: cell
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"cell" , admin . key () . as_ref () , cell . tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump = cell . bump_store)]
